analyzed: tr'i rgyal ba la'o //

original: re pha'i aa yig brjod don /

analyzed: au yig snga ma bzhin dbyi'o zhes bya ba 'di rnams las bya ba'i don las ku pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these [roots] with the meaning of action, the ku affix is added.

original: ku yig las au yig phyung ste /
analyzed: ku yig las au yig phyung ste /
translated: The u is extracted from the ku.

original: ka yig ni ki ta la'o//
analyzed: ka yig ni ki ta la'o//
translated: The ka is kīṭa.

original: @109a * // zhes pas a'ata aeng dgag pa'i don to //
analyzed: @109a * // zhes pas a'ata aeng dgag pa'i don to //
translated: The aṭ is for the purpose of prohibition.

original: des na yang ba mtha' nye'i'o zhes pas aata aeng du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yang ba mtha' nye'i'o zhes pas aata aeng du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since it is close to the end, the aṭ is not.🔽The iśu is the arrow, the bhid is the vajra.

original: ai shu:/...(mda'/) bhi du:/...(rdo rje/) bya dhi'i ya yig las aa yig bzung nas /
analyzed: ai shu:/...(mda'/) bhi du:/...(rdo rje/) bya dhi'i ya yig las aa yig bzung nas /
translated: From the ya of vyadh, the a is taken.

original: kita la de rnams kyi'o zhes pas ya na aika ste /
analyzed: kita la de rnams kyi'o zhes pas ya na aika ste /
translated: Since it is of those, it is yānak.

original: ya yig gi ai yig go //
analyzed: ya yig gi ai yig go //
translated: The i of the ya is the i.

original: ya na ai ka'o zhes pas aa yig ni pha rol sngon ma nyid do //
analyzed: ya na ai ka'o zhes pas aa yig ni pha rol sngon ma nyid do //
translated: The ya of yana is the preceding a.

original: bi dhu:/...(/ me/) gri dhu:/...('dod pa/) dhri shu:/...(spyi brtol/) mchu byung las auta'o zhes pas ri yig gi au nyid do //
analyzed: bi dhu:/...(/ me/) gri dhu:/...('dod pa/) dhri shu:/...(spyi brtol/) mchu byung las auta'o zhes pas ri yig gi au nyid do //
translated: The u of vidhu is the u of the ri.

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: The ra of raka is the preceding a.

original: re pha'i aa yig brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: re pha'i aa yig brjod pa'i don to //
translated: The a of repha is the meaning of to say.

original: pu ru:/...(rgya mtsho/) pri thu:/...(yangs pa/) mri du:/...('jam dbyangs/) sha shi ras dag las aata'i aita'ang ngo //
analyzed: pu ru:/...(rgya mtsho/) pri thu:/...(yangs pa/) mri du:/...('jam dbyangs/) sha shi ras dag las aata'i aita'ang ngo //

original: sha sha ring du 'gro ba la'o /
analyzed: sha sha ring du 'gro ba la'o /

original: ra pa la pa dza pa dzalpa smra ba la'o //
analyzed: ra pa la pa dza pa dzalpa smra ba la'o //

analyzed: sha yig dang sa yig dag gi aa yig ni klog pa'i don te /

original: 'di dag las ku pha rol tu 'gyur te /

original: au yig brjod don /
analyzed: au yig brjod don /
translated: The letter ṇḍa is the other side of the letter ṇḍa.

original: snga ma bzhin du dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
translated: As before, the final of jhal is na, and also of na.

original: ya ya la rjes su nga ro'i yama'o zhes pas sde pa'i ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
analyzed: ya ya la rjes su nga ro'i yama'o zhes pas sde pa'i ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: The final of ya is ya, by the rule: The final of ya is ya.

original: kri t'i gcod pa la'o //
analyzed: kri t'i gcod pa la'o //
translated: Kṛti is for cutting.

original: a'i yig ni shvi a'i dita las ta ta ba ta dag gi'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: a'i yig ni shvi a'i dita las ta ta ba ta dag gi'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter a is for śvā, by the rule: The letter a is for śvā.

original: tstsha ra zol gyis 'gro ba la'o //🔽shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: tstsha ra zol gyis 'gro ba la'o // shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: Cchāra is for going with a pretense.🔽Śrā is for harming.

original: dha na so ba la'o //
analyzed: dha na so ba la'o //
translated: Dhana is for teeth.

original: du minya rab tu 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: du minya rab tu 'phen pa la'o //
translated: Dhmī is for throwing.

original: aa ya ba ya ma ya 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: aa ya ba ya ma ya 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Aya, ava, and ama are for going.

original: shth'a 'gro ba las ldog pa @110a * //
analyzed: shth'a 'gro ba las ldog pa @110a * //
translated: Sthā is for turning back from going.

original: la'o;/ shthi bu dang / shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //
analyzed: la'o;/ shthi bu dang / shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //
translated: The sa of śa is the first of those that are not śub and śvak, by the rule: The sa of śa is sa.

original: rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig go //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig go //
translated: The tha of tha is without reason, by the rule: If there is no reason, then the one with reason is also not.

original: aapa su dur sngon du /
analyzed: aapa su dur sngon du /
translated: Apa is before.

original: dr'a smad pa la'o //
analyzed: dr'a smad pa la'o //
translated: Dhrā is for contempt.

original: y'a thob pa la'o //
analyzed: y'a thob pa la'o //
translated: Yā is for attainment.

original: ha ri / mi tra /
analyzed: ha ri / mi tra /
translated: Hari, Mitra,

original: sngon du zhes pa 'di rnams las ku pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon du zhes pa 'di rnams las ku pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The former of these becomes the latter.🔽śaṅkuḥ

original: sham ku:/...(phur bu'am rtags/) kri ti'i dang po dang mtha' bzlog par bya ste /
analyzed: sham ku:/...(phur bu'am rtags/) kri ti'i dang po dang mtha' bzlog par bya ste /
translated: The first and last of kṛti are reversed.

original: dang por gyur pa ya mtha' dang / mthar gyur pa yang dang po'o //
analyzed: dang por gyur pa ya mtha' dang / mthar gyur pa yang dang po'o //
translated: The first becomes the last, and the last becomes the first.

original: de la aaka ni yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas ri yig gi aa nyid /
analyzed: de la aaka ni yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas ri yig gi aa nyid /
translated: In that regard, ak is the a of ri, because it is said, “ak is the light of the end.”

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: Ra is the other side, because it is said, “The a of ri is the an of ka, and ra is pure.”

original: re pa'i aa yig brjod don /
analyzed: re pa'i aa yig brjod don /
translated: The letter a of re is expressed.

original: ta yig aa yig dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ta yig aa yig dang sbyar ro //
translated: The letter ta is combined with the letter a.🔽tarkeḥ🔽caśruḥ🔽śaruḥ🔽dhanuḥ

analyzed: ka yig ni ki ta bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter ka has the meaning of kritah.

original: ae dha tu:/ pu ru sha:/
analyzed: ae dha tu:/ pu ru sha:/
translated: Edhatuh, the man, is from the root purusah.🔽 Bharuh, the elephant, is from the root jivati.

original: ba ha ru:/...(/ glang/) dz'i ba las aaka tshig phrad do //
analyzed: ba ha ru:/...(/ glang/) dz'i ba las aaka tshig phrad do //
translated: The word ak is a particle.

original: snga ma bzhin du ka yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du ka yig dbyi'o //
translated: As before, the letter ka has the meaning of kritah.

original: dzi ba tu:/...(sman/) aasno ti'i thung ngu /
analyzed: dzi ba tu:/...(sman/) aasno ti'i thung ngu /
translated: Jivatu, the medicine, is from asnoti in the short form.

original: aaptu:/...(mchod sbyin pa/) de bzhin gzhan yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: aaptu:/...(mchod sbyin pa/) de bzhin gzhan yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: Aptuḥ.  ( The giver of worship, and so on.) In the same way, one should understand the others.

original: sta ni / hri shi /
analyzed: sta ni / hri shi /
translated: Stani.  ( The breast, and so on.)🔽Puṣi.  ( The flower, and so on.)

original: phu shi / ma di rnams las ni mtha' las airnu tsa'o //
analyzed: phu shi / ma di rnams las ni mtha' las airnu tsa'o //
translated: Mādī.  ( The joy, and so on.)🔽Gajaḥ.  ( The elephant, and so on.)

original: glang / stan:/ ba na ka la sgra'i don rnams so //🔽hri shu dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: glang / stan:/ ba na ka la sgra'i don rnams so // hri shu dga' ba la'o //
translated: Stanaḥ.  ( The breast, and so on.)🔽Vanaḥ.  ( The forest, and so on.)

original: pusha rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: pusha rgyas pa'o //
translated: Puṣyaḥ.  ( The flower, and so on.)

original: ga da smra ba la'o //
analyzed: ga da smra ba la'o //
translated: Gadaḥ.  ( The speech, and so on.)

original: ma di dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: ma di dga' ba la'o //
translated: Mādī.  ( The joy, and so on.)

original: aa yig sogs dbyi ba sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: aa yig sogs dbyi ba sngar bzhin no //
translated: The letter a and so on are elided as before.

original: sgra sgrogs pa la rab tu sbyor ro zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag byas nas sbyor ba lani tsa'o //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs pa la rab tu sbyor ro zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag byas nas sbyor ba lani tsa'o //
translated: Having made the statement it is applied to the proclamation of sound, and so on, the suffix ni is added.

original: na yig ni nynita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: na yig ni nynita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The letter na is the substitute for the sign of the affix nit.

original: mang po'i tshig las nynita la'o zhes pas a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di rnams las ni'i mtha' las airnu tsa pha rol ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang po'i tshig las nynita la'o zhes pas a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di rnams las ni'i mtha' las airnu tsa pha rol ru 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is said nit is from the word of many, the a does not become a. From the end of ni, ai ru becomes the other side.

original: tsa yig cata las so zhes pa'i rtags don /🔽a'ama aana a'a lu /
analyzed: tsa yig cata las so zhes pa'i rtags don / a'ama aana a'a lu /
translated: The letter ca is from the affix cat.🔽 The sign of the affix is a, an, a, and a.

original: a'a ya airnu rnams la aa ya'o zhes pas ni'i aa ya ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: a'a ya airnu rnams la aa ya'o zhes pas ni'i aa ya ru 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is said a, ai, and a are a, the a of ni becomes a.

original: stan yirna:/...(sprin/)...yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas aa nyid /
analyzed: stan yirna:/...(sprin/)...yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas aa nyid /
translated: The a is the a itself.

original: ra pha rol lo //🔽harsha yitnu:... (gser/)yang ba mtha' nye'i'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
analyzed: ra pha rol lo // harsha yitnu:... (gser/)yang ba mtha' nye'i'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
translated: The ra is the other side.🔽 The o is the o itself.

original: posha...(gsos pa/) @111b yirnu:/...(khu byug) ga da yirnu:/...(/ mang du smra ba/) ma da yirnu:/...(chang/) hri tri dag las aernu'o //
analyzed: posha...(gsos pa/) @111b yirnu:/...(khu byug) ga da yirnu:/...(/ mang du smra ba/) ma da yirnu:/...(chang/) hri tri dag las aernu'o //
translated: The e is from poṣa and aṅga, the e from mada and hrīḍa.

original: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //
analyzed: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //
translated: The hrī is for harṣa,🔽 The a is for āyata,🔽 The i is for iṣṭa,🔽 The u is for ūrdhva,🔽 The e is for eka,🔽 The o is for oṣṭha,🔽 The ai is for āyāsita,🔽 The o is for oṣṭha,🔽 The aṃ is for aṅga,🔽 The aḥ is for āyata,🔽 The ka is for kaṇṭha,🔽 The kha is for kṣema,🔽 The ga is for gati,🔽 The gha is for ghora,

original: nya yig ni hrinya 'gro ba'i ngang tshul la'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
analyzed: nya yig ni hrinya 'gro ba'i ngang tshul la'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
translated: The ṅa is for aṅga,

original: du krinya byed pa la'o //
analyzed: du krinya byed pa la'o //
translated: The ca is for caraṇa,🔽 The cha is for cāpala,🔽 The ja is for jāti,🔽 The jha is for jhaṭiti,

original: du yig ni du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don //🔽nya yig ni krinya las suta med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags kyi don zhes pa 'di dag las aenu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du yig ni du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don // nya yig ni krinya las suta med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags kyi don zhes pa 'di dag las aenu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The ṇa is for nātha,🔽 The ṭa is for ṭhaṭa,🔽 The ṭha is for ṭhaṭa,🔽 The ḍa is for ḍhaḍha,🔽 The ḍha is for ḍhaḍha,

original: ai ka'i aata aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid /
analyzed: ai ka'i aata aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid /
translated: The bha is for bhaya,🔽 The ya is for yāna,

original: ra pha rol nyid /
analyzed: ra pha rol nyid /
translated: The ra is for raṅga,🔽 The la is for laṅghayati,

original: ha re nu:/...(dri'i rdzas/) ka re nu:/...(glang mo/) d'a bh'a dag las nu'o //
analyzed: ha re nu:/...(dri'i rdzas/) ka re nu:/...(glang mo/) d'a bh'a dag las nu'o //
translated: Harena,  (from) the substance of smell. Karēna,  (from) the female elephant. Dābhā,  (from) giving.

original: du d'a sbyin pa la'o //
analyzed: du d'a sbyin pa la'o //
translated: Dudu,  (from) giving.

original: du yig ni du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
analyzed: du yig ni du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
translated: The letter du is the affix ktra, which has the meaning of the sign from.

original: bh'a 'bar ba la'o //
analyzed: bh'a 'bar ba la'o //
translated: Bhā,  (from) burning.

original: zhes pa 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, the affix nu becomes the other side.

original: d'a nu:/...(sbyin pa po/) bh'a nu:/...(nyi ma/)r'i brinya dag las ni ta'o //
analyzed: d'a nu:/...(sbyin pa po/) bh'a nu:/...(nyi ma/)r'i brinya dag las ni ta'o //
translated: Dānu,  (from) the giver. Bhānu,  (from) the sun. Rī,  (from) going.

original: ri bri 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: ri bri 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Rī,  (from) going.

original: brinya sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: brinya sgrib pa la'o //
translated: Bṛi,  (from) obscuring.

original: nya yig ni brinya / sgrib pa la'o zhes pa'i rtags don zhes pa 'di las nu pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: nya yig ni brinya / sgrib pa la'o zhes pa'i rtags don zhes pa 'di las nu pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /
translated: The letter ṇya is the affix ktra, which has the meaning of the sign from. From this, the affix nu becomes the other side.

original: ni ta'o zhes pas na yig phyis pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ni ta'o zhes pas na yig phyis pa bzhin te /
translated: Since it is said ṇita, the letter na is as if erased.

original: des na ni ta nyid kyi phyir dbyangs so //
analyzed: des na ni ta nyid kyi phyir dbyangs so //
translated: Therefore, because of being ṇita, it is a vowel.

original: aika'i aata aenga'o zhes pas ae nyid /
analyzed: aika'i aata aenga'o zhes pas ae nyid /
translated: Since it is said ai of ika, it is ai itself.

original: ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: Ra is the other side.

original: tshig gcig las ra sha las na'i na'o zhes pas na nyid /
analyzed: tshig gcig las ra sha las na'i na'o zhes pas na nyid /
translated: Since it is said na from ra, it is na itself.

original: re nu:/...(rdul/) warnnu:/...(sgra'o//) s'u:/
analyzed: re nu:/...(rdul/) warnnu:/...(sgra'o//) s'u:/
translated: Rēna,  (from) dust. Varṇena,  (from) sound. Sū,  (from) thread.

original: bi shi dag las kita'o //
analyzed: bi shi dag las kita'o //
translated: From viśi, kit.

original: sh'u ded pa la'o //
analyzed: sh'u ded pa la'o //
translated: In śaudedapa.

original: shthi bu shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig / bi shli khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: shthi bu shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig / bi shli khyab pa la'o //
translated: Since śa is the first of the śa group, and is not śubh, śa is the substitute for sa.

original: li yig ni li dita dyu ti sogs rnams las aata la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: li yig ni li dita dyu ti sogs rnams las aata la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The letter li is the substitute for li in lidita, dyuti, etc.

original: de dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /
translated: From those, the nu becomes the other side.

original: kita bzhin yin pa des na kita la aata aenga dgag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kita bzhin yin pa des na kita la aata aenga dgag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is like kit, kit is the negation of at.

original: s'u nu:/...(bu/) bishnu:/...(khyab 'jug gam sred med bu/) dhe nu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: s'u nu:/...(bu/) bishnu:/...(khyab 'jug gam sred med bu/) dhe nu la sogs pa rnams so //

original: dhe ta btung ba la'o ;
analyzed: dhe ta btung ba la'o ;
translated: Dhe is drinking.

original: / shita ma yin pa'i aetsa'i aata'o zhes pas a'a nyid du mi 'gyur te tshig phrad las so //
analyzed: / shita ma yin pa'i aetsa'i aata'o zhes pas a'a nyid du mi 'gyur te tshig phrad las so //

original: ao h'akka gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: ao h'akka gtong ba la'o //

original: ao yig ni ao dita las zhes pa'i rtags don //
analyzed: ao yig ni ao dita las zhes pa'i rtags don //

original: shth'a 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o //
analyzed: shth'a 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o //
translated: Śath is the substitute for gati, to go, in the sense of to turn back.

original: shthi bu dang shvakkama yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gis yig / rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can gyi yang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig / aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: shthi bu dang shvakkama yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gis yig / rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can gyi yang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig / aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The first syllable of the first syllable of Sthavira and Svakakara is the syllable sa. The syllable tha of the syllable tha is atha because of If there is no reason, there is no one with a reason. The syllable va is for going in the instrumental case.

original: ba da smra ba la'o //
analyzed: ba da smra ba la'o //

original: da'i aa brjod don //
analyzed: da'i aa brjod don //

original: 'di rnams las nu pha rol du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las nu pha rol du 'gyur ro //
translated: Among these, the syllable nu becomes the other.

original: dhe nu:/...(ba grus ma/) dzah'a ma ta'i tshig phrad las gnyis brjod /
analyzed: dhe nu:/...(ba grus ma/) dzah'a ma ta'i tshig phrad las gnyis brjod /

analyzed: ha'i thung ngu'o zhes pas thung ngu nyid / ku ha dag gi @112a * //

analyzed: tsu'o zhes pas ha yig gi dzha yig go //

original: tshig phrad las aa yig dbyi ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshig phrad las aa yig dbyi ba nyid do //

original: dzhal gyi dzasha'o zhes pas dzha yig gi dza yig go //
analyzed: dzhal gyi dzasha'o zhes pas dzha yig gi dza yig go //

analyzed: dzahna:/...(drang srong/) tshig phrad las na nyid do //

analyzed: sth'a nu:/..(lha chen/) aika'i aata aenga zhes pas ae nyid /

analyzed: benu:/...('od ma/) ba d'i'i da yig gi ga yig / bagmu:/..(gsar bar smra ba/) de bzhin du gzhan yang shes par bya'o //

analyzed: ksha si / na di dag las tsa nu'ang ngo //

analyzed: kshi pa ded pa la'o //

analyzed: pa'i aa brjod don /

analyzed: na shr'i no ti'i shma sha ru bsgyur ro //

analyzed: shma shru:/...(sma ra'am kha spu/) de bzhin du sgra gzhan yang blta bar bya'o //

analyzed: yu las a'a g'u tsa'o //

analyzed: yu spel ba la'o //

analyzed: 'di las a'a g'u tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bhra mu g-yo ba la'o // 'di las d'u pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: d'u yig las au yig phyung ste /

analyzed: da yig ni tita la zhes pas mtha'i aa tsa la sogs pa dbyi ba'i don te /

analyzed: mtha'i aa tsa la sogs pa zhes pas aa yig dang ma yig dag dbyi'o //

analyzed: bhru:...(smin ma'am mig gi steng na gnas pa/)tsa mi ta ni ba dhi rnams las a'u'o //

original: tsa mu tstsha mu /
analyzed: tsa mu tstsha mu /

original: dza mu / dzha mu za ba la'o //
analyzed: dza mu / dzha mu za ba la'o //

original: ta nu rgyas pa la'o //
analyzed: ta nu rgyas pa la'o //

original: au yig ni au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don //
analyzed: au yig ni au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don //

original: ba dha 'ching ba la'o //
analyzed: ba dha 'ching ba la'o //

original: dha'i aa klog don /
analyzed: dha'i aa klog don /

original: 'di rnams las a'u pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las a'u pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: su'i ru nyid la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: su'i ru nyid la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //

original: tsa m'u:/...(bde'o//) ta n'u:/...(lus/) ba dh'u:/...(mna' mo/)ka sha'i tsha ru 'ang ngo //
analyzed: tsa m'u:/...(bde'o//) ta n'u:/...(lus/) ba dh'u:/...(mna' mo/)ka sha'i tsha ru 'ang ngo //

original: ka sha shi sha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las a'u pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ka sha shi sha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di las a'u pha rol tu 'gyur zhing /

original: tsha ru 'ang ngo zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig / tsha la'ang ngo zhes pas tu ka'o //
analyzed: tsha ru 'ang ngo zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig / tsha la'ang ngo zhes pas tu ka'o //

original: au yig brjod don /
analyzed: au yig brjod don /

original: ka yig ki ta bya ba'i don //🔽stu'i shtsu dang shtu dag gi de dag go zhes pas ta yig / gi tsa yig / katstsh'u:/...(g+yan pa/)tr'i las duta 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka yig ki ta bya ba'i don // stu'i shtsu dang shtu dag gi de dag go zhes pas ta yig / gi tsa yig / katstsh'u:/...(g+yan pa/)tr'i las duta 'ang ngo //
translated: The letter ka means kit.

analyzed: tr'i las rkyal pa la'o // 'di las a'u pha rol du 'gyur zhing / duta 'ang ngo /
translated: The ta of śu-ta and śa-ta is the ta of ta-ra. The ca of ca-ra is the ca of ca-tsa. The ra of ra-sa is the ra of ra-sa. The u of du-ta is the u of du-ta.

original: zhes pas du ta'o //
analyzed: zhes pas du ta'o //
translated: The ra of ra-sa is the ra of ra-sa.🔽The u of du-ta is the u of du-ta.

original: au yig brjod don /
analyzed: au yig brjod don /
translated: The letter u is pronounced.

original: ta yig ti ta bya ba'i don to //🔽ai ka'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: ta yig ti ta bya ba'i don to // ai ka'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid do //
translated: The letter ta means ti-ta.🔽The a of a-ta is the a of a-ta. The ra of ra-sa is the ra of ra-sa. The u of du-ta is the u of du-ta.🔽The a of a-ta is the a of a-ta. The ra of ra-sa is the ra of ra-sa. The u of du-ta is the u of du-ta.

analyzed: de nyid kyis numa'o //

original: kri ba brtse ba la'o //
analyzed: kri ba brtse ba la'o //

original: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //
analyzed: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //

analyzed: rit ces pa mdo'i byings so //

original: r'a l'a len pa la'o ;
analyzed: r'a l'a len pa la'o ;

original: // ka pha sngon /
analyzed: // ka pha sngon /

analyzed: 'di rnams las a'u pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de la dza na'i na yig gi ma yig dang bug a'a ga ma /
translated: In that, the letter jña is the letter ma of the anusvāra.

original: au yig brjod don /
analyzed: au yig brjod don /
translated: The letter u is the meaning of the word.

original: ka yig ki ta bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ka yig ki ta bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter ka is the meaning of the word kīta.🔽Jambu is a kind of tree.

original: dzamb'u:/...(/ shing gi rigs/) danbhi'i aa yig gi ri yig dang / rjes su nga ro med pa tshig phrad do //
analyzed: dzamb'u:/...(/ shing gi rigs/) danbhi'i aa yig gi ri yig dang / rjes su nga ro med pa tshig phrad do //

original: drinbh'u:...(sbrul gyi rigs/) da dha'i aata ai nyid dang / ai shuka a'a gama'o //
analyzed: drinbh'u:...(sbrul gyi rigs/) da dha'i aata ai nyid dang / ai shuka a'a gama'o //
translated: The letter ṛ of the letter a of the word dadhi is the letter i itself, and the letter i is the anusvāra.

original: au yig brjod don to //
analyzed: au yig brjod don to //
translated: The letter u is the meaning of the word.

original: ka yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
analyzed: ka yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
translated: The letter ka is as before.🔽Dhīśu is a maiden who has not gone to be married.🔽Pūrṇbhū is the husband of a barren woman.

original: di dhi shu:/...(bag mar ma song ba'i bu mo/) p'unarbh'u:/...(/ yugs sa ma'i bdag po/) ka ro ti'i aika'i /
analyzed: di dhi shu:/...(bag mar ma song ba'i bu mo/) p'unarbh'u:/...(/ yugs sa ma'i bdag po/) ka ro ti'i aika'i /

original: aata aenga ngo zhes pas aa nyid /
analyzed: aata aenga ngo zhes pas aa nyid /

original: ra pha rol nyid dang kandhu ka a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: ra pha rol nyid dang kandhu ka a'a ga ma'o //

original: rjes 'brel dbyi ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rjes 'brel dbyi ba snga ma bzhin no //

original: da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o //
analyzed: da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o //

original: da'i aa brjod don //
analyzed: da'i aa brjod don //

analyzed: na'i na'o zhes pa 'di dag las tsa nu'ang pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, ca also becomes the other side.

original: tsa yig las aa yig phyung ste /
analyzed: tsa yig las aa yig phyung ste /
translated: The letter ca is extracted as the letter a.

original: tsa yig ni dbyangs don no //
analyzed: tsa yig ni dbyangs don no //

original: nga yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aenga dgag pa'i don to //
analyzed: nga yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aenga dgag pa'i don to //

original: des na yang ba mtha' nye'i ae nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yang ba mtha' nye'i ae nyid du mi 'gyur ro //

original: kshi pa nu:/...(rlung/) na da nu/...(sprin/) sarti las aa yu'o //
analyzed: kshi pa nu:/...(rlung/) na da nu/...(sprin/) sarti las aa yu'o //

original: sri 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: sri 'gro ba la'o //

original: 'di las au yu pha rol du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las au yu pha rol du 'gyur ro //

original: aika'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid /
analyzed: aika'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid /

original: ra pha rol la'o //
analyzed: ra pha rol la'o //
translated: The ra is the other side.

original: sar yu:/...(chu klung/) dza n'i ma ni da si bhu dzi rnams las dkyus so //
analyzed: sar yu:/...(chu klung/) dza n'i ma ni da si bhu dzi rnams las dkyus so //

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //

analyzed: a'i yig ni shvi a'i dita las ta ta bta dag gi'o zhes pa'i @113a * //

analyzed: rtags don / ma na shes pa la'o //

original: na'i aa brjod don /🔽ta su / da su /
analyzed: na'i aa brjod don / ta su / da su /

original: nye bar 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'phen pa la'o //

original: au yig ni au di ta las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: au yig ni au di ta las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: bhu dza skyong ba la'o //
analyzed: bhu dza skyong ba la'o //

original: dza'i aa yig klog don to zhes pa 'di rnams las bya ba'i don la dkyus pha rol /
analyzed: dza'i aa yig klog don to zhes pa 'di rnams las bya ba'i don la dkyus pha rol /

original: ka yig ni aata aenga dgag pa'i don /
analyzed: ka yig ni aata aenga dgag pa'i don /

original: au yig ni au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
analyzed: au yig ni au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
translated: The letter u is the sign of the word udit, “arisen.”

original: kri sha phra mor byed pa la'o //
analyzed: kri sha phra mor byed pa la'o //
translated: Kṛṣa is the sign of the word kṣaṇa, “moment.”

original: sha'i aa brjod don zhes pa 'di rnams las rim bzhin kuka dang / suka dang aa nu ka rnams pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sha'i aa brjod don zhes pa 'di rnams las rim bzhin kuka dang / suka dang aa nu ka rnams pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, ku, su, and anu, respectively, become the other [letters].

original: ka yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aenga dgag pa'i don /🔽hr'i ku:/...(zhum pa/)ka pi ri la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la nyid do //
analyzed: ka yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aenga dgag pa'i don / hr'i ku:/...(zhum pa/)ka pi ri la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la nyid do //
translated: The letter ka is the sign of the word kit, “to block.”🔽The letter la is the sign of the word hṛk, “to be depressed,” and kapila, “reddish-brown.”

original: hl'i ku: de nyid /
analyzed: hl'i ku: de nyid /
translated: The letter ha is the sign of the word hṛk.🔽The letter śa is the sign of the word śaṅkha, “conch.”

original: sa la sha dha dag gi aa'o zhes pas sha'i ka'o //🔽ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
analyzed: sa la sha dha dag gi aa'o zhes pas sha'i ka'o // ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
translated: The letter śa is the sign of the word śaṅkha.🔽The letter i is the sign of the word ikṣu, “sugar cane.”

original: aikshu:/...(bur shing/) kri sh'a nu:/...(me/) mringa las tyuka'o //🔽mringa srog gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: aikshu:/...(bur shing/) kri sh'a nu:/...(me/) mringa las tyuka'o // mringa srog gtong ba la'o //
translated: The letter ṇ is the sign of the word kṛṣṇa, “black.”

original: nga yig ni dita las so zhes pa'i rtags don //🔽'di las tyuka pha rol ka yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o //🔽mri tyu:/...('ching ba/) sh'ing las dhuka'o //
analyzed: nga yig ni dita las so zhes pa'i rtags don // 'di las tyuka pha rol ka yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o // mri tyu:/...('ching ba/) sh'ing las dhuka'o //
translated: The letter ty is the sign of the word mṛta, “dead.”🔽The letter m is the sign of the word mṛta.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
translated: The letter ḍh is the sign of the word śayita, “lying down.”

original: nga yig ni lita ma yin pa la shing gi aeta'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: nga yig ni lita ma yin pa la shing gi aeta'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The letter ṅa is from nīlita, and the sign of the wood eta.

original: 'di las dhyuga pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las dhyuga pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, the dhyuk becomes the other side.

original: ka yig ni kita las so zhes pa'i rtags don //
analyzed: ka yig ni kita las so zhes pa'i rtags don //
translated: The letter ka is from kīta.

original: dgag ba'i don to //
analyzed: dgag ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the object of negation.🔽Śīdhu: the difference of beer.

original: sh'i dhu:/...(/ chang gi khyad par/) pr'i las shun dang aa shutsa dag go //
analyzed: sh'i dhu:/...(/ chang gi khyad par/) pr'i las shun dang aa shutsa dag go //
translated: From pāra, the bark and the aśu.

original: pr'i skyong ba la'o //
analyzed: pr'i skyong ba la'o //
translated: It is the protector of pāra.

original: 'di las shun dang aa shu tsa pha rol te /
analyzed: 'di las shun dang aa shu tsa pha rol te /
translated: From this, the bark and the aśu are the other side.

original: na dang tsa yig dbyangs don no //
analyzed: na dang tsa yig dbyangs don no //
translated: The letters na and ca are for the sake of the vowel.

original: ai ka'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid /🔽ra pha rol lo re pha'i aa yig brjod don /🔽parshu:/...(dgra sta) pa ra shu:/...(rtsib ma'i rus pa/) p'i /
analyzed: ai ka'i aata aenga zhes pas aa nyid / ra pha rol lo re pha'i aa yig brjod don / parshu:/...(dgra sta) pa ra shu:/...(rtsib ma'i rus pa/) p'i /
translated: The letter a is from ika's aṅga.🔽The letter ra is the other side. The letter a of re is for the sake of expression.🔽Pāśu: the bone of the rib.

original: m'i dag las ru'o //
analyzed: m'i dag las ru'o //
translated: From pāśu, the bone.

original: p'ing btung ba la'o /
analyzed: p'ing btung ba la'o /
translated: Pāṅkti is for drinking.

original: m'ing 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: m'ing 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: Māṅgalyā is for harm.

original: nga yig ni stong ldan pa las hal dang po nga med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nga yig ni stong ldan pa las hal dang po nga med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter ṅa is from the one with a thousand, the first ha without ṅa.

original: 'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur /
translated: From these, the ru becomes the other side.

original: aika'i aata aenga zhes pas ze nyid /
analyzed: aika'i aata aenga zhes pas ze nyid /
translated: The letter a is from ika's aṅga.

original: pe ru:/...(nyi ma/) me ru:/...(ri'i rgyal po/) / su snga ma las /🔽su me ru:/...(ri rab/) dza tru la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: pe ru:/...(nyi ma/) me ru:/...(ri'i rgyal po/) / su snga ma las / su me ru:/...(ri rab/) dza tru la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Sumeru means mountain.

original: dza na @113b rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza na @113b rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Jana means to be born.

original: sha dli rnam par rgyu ba la'o //
analyzed: sha dli rnam par rgyu ba la'o //
translated: Sari means to move.🔽 Tukuru means sound.

original: tukshu ru ku sgra la'o //
analyzed: tukshu ru ku sgra la'o //
translated: Khanu means to destroy.🔽 Sring means to sleep.🔽 Sru means to obtain.🔽 In these, ru becomes ra.

original: kha nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
analyzed: kha nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
translated: Jana means one side of the throat.🔽 Khanu means mirror handle.🔽 Sring means good eye medicine.🔽 Karandhu means jujube fruit.🔽 Adi means long.🔽 Sari means to move.🔽 Khanu means to destroy.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
translated: Sring means to sleep.

original: shru thob pa la'o //
analyzed: shru thob pa la'o //
translated: Sru means to obtain.

original: 'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: In these, ru becomes ra.🔽 Jana means one side of the throat.🔽 Khanu means mirror handle.🔽 Sring means good eye medicine.🔽 Karandhu means jujube fruit.🔽 Adi means long.🔽 Sari means to move.

original: de la dza ni dang sha di'i mtha' ta yig tu bsgyur ba tshig phrad do //
analyzed: de la dza ni dang sha di'i mtha' ta yig tu bsgyur ba tshig phrad do //
translated: Khanu means to destroy.🔽 Sring means to sleep.🔽 Sru means to obtain.🔽 In these, ru becomes ra.🔽 Jana means one side of the throat.🔽 Khanu means mirror handle.🔽 Sring means good eye medicine.🔽 Karandhu means jujube fruit.

original: dza tru:/...(mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig/) ru ru:/...(ri dags/) sha tru:/...(mi mdza' ba/) kha na'i na dbyi /
analyzed: dza tru:/...(mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig/) ru ru:/...(ri dags/) sha tru:/...(mi mdza' ba/) kha na'i na dbyi /
translated: Adi means long.🔽 Sari means to move.🔽 Khanu means to destroy.🔽 Sring means to sleep.

original: kha ru:/...(me long gi yu ba/) she ti'i thung ngu dang kuka a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: kha ru:/...(me long gi yu ba/) she ti'i thung ngu dang kuka a'a ga ma'o //
translated: Sru means to obtain.🔽 In these, ru becomes ra.🔽 Jana means one side of the throat.🔽 Khanu means mirror handle.🔽 Sring means good eye medicine.🔽 Karandhu means jujube fruit.

original: shi gru:/...(mig sman bzang po/) karkandhu:/...(rgya shug gi 'bru/) aa di'i ring po nyid /
analyzed: shi gru:/...(mig sman bzang po/) karkandhu:/...(rgya shug gi 'bru/) aa di'i ring po nyid /
translated: Adi

original: a'a d'u:/...(chu sgrol ba/) lam bi'i na dbyi ba dang ring po nyid do //
analyzed: a'a d'u:/...(chu sgrol ba/) lam bi'i na dbyi ba dang ring po nyid do //
translated: means “to cross the water” and “long” for lambī.🔽ālavau

original: aa l'a b'u:/...(ku ba tumba'i 'bras bu/)sha ki las ru ka'o //

original: aika mtha' nye las ki'o //
analyzed: aika mtha' nye las ki'o //

original: aika ces pa so sor bsdu ba bzung ba ste /

original: ai aun / ri lika ces pa ai ka'o //🔽mtha'i nye ba ni mtha' nye ste /
analyzed: ai aun / ri lika ces pa ai ka'o // mtha'i nye ba ni mtha' nye ste /

analyzed: ai ka nye ba'i mtha' gang yin pa de 'dir aika mtha' nye'o //
translated: The proximate of the end is the proximate of the end.🔽The i that is the proximate of the end is here the proximate of the final i.

analyzed: de las te aika las mtha' nye las bya ba'i don la ki pha rol du 'gyur ro //
translated: From that i, the proximate of the end, the particle ki becomes the other side.

original: de la kri tha rnam par brko ba la'o //
analyzed: de la kri tha rnam par brko ba la'o //
translated: There, kṛt is for digging.

original: shu tsa mya ngan la'o //
analyzed: shu tsa mya ngan la'o //

original: ru tsir gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: ru tsir gsal ba la'o //

original: kshi pa 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: kshi pa 'phen pa la'o //

analyzed: kra mu rkang pa skyed pa la'o //

analyzed: de la ki pha rol du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mu ni:/...(thub pa'i drang srong/) aam hi:/

analyzed: kalbi dag gi na dbyi ba 'ang ngo //

original: aa hi 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: aa hi 'gro ba la'o //

translated: The sign of the final ma, i.e., li, ta, a, means “other side.” In these [words], ka becomes pa, and na becomes i.🔽In aḥ, ka, pi, śrī, paśu, va, pī, rāja, bhrī, and bha, iñ is [used].

original: aa hi:/...(srul/) ka pi:/...(spre'u/) shri pa si ba pi r'a dzi bri ha ni bha ni rnams las ainya'o //🔽shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: aa hi:/...(srul/) ka pi:/...(spre'u/) shri pa si ba pi r'a dzi bri ha ni bha ni rnams las ainya'o // shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //

original: ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o //
translated: Va is [used] for “abiding.”

original: tu ba sa bon bsags pa la'o //
analyzed: tu ba sa bon bsags pa la'o //

original: tu yig ni tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don //
analyzed: tu yig ni tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don //

original: ri dzra 'bar ba la'oo //
analyzed: ri dzra 'bar ba la'oo //

analyzed: ri yig ni aaka phyis pa dang / sh'a su ri dita rnams / kyi ma yin no zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: bri nya sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: bri nya sgrib pa la'o //

original: nya yig ni nyati la'o zhes pa'i rtags don //

original: ha na 'tshe ba la'o //

original: na bha tu bha 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: na bha tu bha 'tshe ba la'o //

original: nya yig nynita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: aa'ang ngo zhes pas a'a nyid do //
analyzed: aa'ang ngo zhes pas a'a nyid do //

original: ra pha rol nyid /
analyzed: ra pha rol nyid /

original: gha sli za ba la'o //

analyzed: pa na tha snyad la'o /

analyzed: benya snal ma'i rgyud la'o nya yig ni be nya'i lita la ba sa yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: shita ma yin pa la aetsa'i a'a nyid do //
analyzed: shita ma yin pa la aetsa'i a'a nyid do //
translated: In the case of not being śita, it is the ā of aṭ.

original: 'di las di pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las di pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: da yig las ai yig bzung nas da yig ni deta bya ba'i don to //

original: des na dita la zhes pas mtha'i aa tsa la sogs pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: des na dita la zhes pas mtha'i aa tsa la sogs pa dbyi'o //

original: b'i: ni las a'ita 'ang ngo //
analyzed: b'i: ni las a'ita 'ang ngo //

analyzed: benya zhes pa 'jug pas ni snga ma can gyi benyal di 'gyur zhing da yig dbyi ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin no //

original: aita 'ang ngo zhes pas ni'i a'i nyid do //
analyzed: aita 'ang ngo zhes pas ni'i a'i nyid do //

original: khya rab tu gtam pa la'o //
analyzed: khya rab tu gtam pa la'o //

original: sa m'an sngon du sa m'a na'i paksha la sogs pa rnams bya /
analyzed: sa m'an sngon du sa m'a na'i paksha la sogs pa rnams bya /

original: la'o zhes pas sa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: la'o zhes pas sa'i dngos po'o //

original: bha dza:/ shri bsten pa la'o //
analyzed: bha dza:/ shri bsten pa la'o //

original: a'ang sngon du /
analyzed: a'ang sngon du /

original: nga yig ni a'ang m'anga'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: nga yig ni a'ang m'anga'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: ao h'a ka gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: ao h'a ka gtong ba la'o //

original: ao yig ni ao di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don to //
analyzed: ao yig ni ao di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don to //

original: aa shri:/...(mtha'/) pra hi:/...(khron pa/)bhra ma'i mtha'i aatsa la sogs pa tshig phrad las mi dbyi ba dang / ri pha'i 'ang ri yig go //
analyzed: aa shri:/...(mtha'/) pra hi:/...(khron pa/)bhra ma'i mtha'i aatsa la sogs pa tshig phrad las mi dbyi ba dang / ri pha'i 'ang ri yig go //
translated: The a of the bhrāmi is not elided from the particle, and the ri of the ripa is the ri vowel.🔽The a of the bhrāmi is the wind.

original: bhri mi:...(rlung/) ka ro ti'i ri yig gi aa nyid do //🔽k'a ri:/...(bzo mo/) de bzhin sgra gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bhri mi:...(rlung/) ka ro ti'i ri yig gi aa nyid do // k'a ri:/...(bzo mo/) de bzhin sgra gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The a of the karoti is the ri vowel.

original: sanydzi aa se dag las kthina'o //🔽shanydza 'grogs pa la'o /
analyzed: sanydzi aa se dag las kthina'o // shanydza 'grogs pa la'o /
translated: The a of the kāriḥ is the artisan.🔽The a of the sanyaḥ is the a of the as.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.

original: shthi bu shakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o //🔽aa su 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: shthi bu shakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o // aa su 'phen pa la'o //
translated: The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.

original: 'di dag las shthina pha @116a * //🔽rol tu 'gyur ro //🔽na yig ni dbyangs don no //
analyzed: 'di dag las shthina pha @116a * // rol tu 'gyur ro // na yig ni dbyangs don no //
translated: The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅkha is the shell.

original: ka yig ni ki ta bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ka yig ni ki ta bya ba'i don to //
translated: The a of the śaṅkha is the conch.🔽The a of the śaṅ

original: ki ta las hal lam ai di ta ma yin pa'i mtha' nye'e'o zhes pas nya dbyi'o //🔽tsu'i ku'o zhes pas ku nyid kyi dza yig gi ga yig go //
analyzed: ki ta las hal lam ai di ta ma yin pa'i mtha' nye'e'o zhes pas nya dbyi'o // tsu'i ku'o zhes pas ku nyid kyi dza yig gi ga yig go //
translated: The suffix -ana is added to the root kīta by the rule hal-anta-idama-anta-nyāpaḥ, meaning fish.🔽The suffix -ka is added to the root cu by the rule ku-ja-gaḥ.

original: khar la dzha ram tsa ra zhes pas ga yig gi ka yig go //
analyzed: khar la dzha ram tsa ra zhes pas ga yig gi ka yig go //
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root kṛ by the rule kṛ-la-jaha-caraḥ.

original: sakthi:/...(brla'i phyogs) aasthi:/...(rus pa/) s'a ri las aa thina'o //🔽pri 'gro ba la'o //🔽'gro bar 'dod pa la rab tu sbyor ba la sbyor ba po'i bya ba la'o zhes pas ni tsa'o //
analyzed: sakthi:/...(brla'i phyogs) aasthi:/...(rus pa/) s'a ri las aa thina'o // pri 'gro ba la'o // 'gro bar 'dod pa la rab tu sbyor ba la sbyor ba po'i bya ba la'o zhes pas ni tsa'o //
translated: The suffix -thika is added to the root asthi by the rule asthi-athin-sarvaḥ.🔽The suffix -ka is added to the root pri by the rule pri-gati-icchā-prayoge prayoktuḥ kriyāyāḥ.

original: tsa yig dbyangs don //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs don //
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root ca by the rule ca-ādeśaḥ.

original: na yig nyanita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //🔽aa'ang ngo zhes pas a'a nyid /
analyzed: na yig nyanita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don to // aa'ang ngo zhes pas a'a nyid /
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root na by the rule nī-nidhāna-ādiṣu.🔽The suffix -ka is added to the root a by the rule a-api.

original: aa thin pha rol tu 'gyur ro //🔽na yig dbyangs don /
analyzed: aa thin pha rol tu 'gyur ro // na yig dbyangs don /
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root athin by the rule athin-parāḥ.🔽The suffix -ka is added to the root na by the rule nī-nidhāna-ādiṣu.

original: ni'i aita ma yin pa la'o zhes pas ni dbyi'o //
analyzed: ni'i aita ma yin pa la'o zhes pas ni dbyi'o //
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root na by the rule nī-nidhāna-ādiṣu.

original: sa ra thi:/...(kha lo bsgyur ba'am shing rta 'dren pa/)aam gi aa ti dag las au ri ai thi na dag go //
analyzed: sa ra thi:/...(kha lo bsgyur ba'am shing rta 'dren pa/)aam gi aa ti dag las au ri ai thi na dag go //
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root sarathi by the rule amgi-ati-ādiṣu ūri-iti-athin-ādiṣu.

original: aa gi ra gi la gi 'gro ba'i don rnams so //
analyzed: aa gi ra gi la gi 'gro ba'i don rnams so //
translated: The suffix -ka is added to the root agiri by the rule agiri-ādiṣu gati-ārthaḥ.

original: ai yig ni ai di ta las nu ma'o //
analyzed: ai yig ni ai di ta las nu ma'o //
translated: The letter i is the breast, from iḍa.

original: au yig brjod don /
analyzed: au yig brjod don /
translated: The letter u is the meaning of the word.

original: rjes su nga ro'i ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
analyzed: rjes su nga ro'i ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: The letter a is the nearest to the sound of the anusvara.

original: aa ta mgyogs pa dang ldan par 'gro ba la'o ;
analyzed: aa ta mgyogs pa dang ldan par 'gro ba la'o ;
translated: The letter a is for going quickly.

original: /'di dag la rim bzhin au ri au thin dag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: /'di dag la rim bzhin au ri au thin dag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: In these, u, ṛ, and ṛ become the other side.🔽The letter na is the meaning of the vowel, from aṅguli, karī, karī, and so on.

original: na yig dbyangs don/(sor mo/)...aam gu ri ka pi ri ka la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la nyid do //
analyzed: na yig dbyangs don/(sor mo/)...aam gu ri ka pi ri ka la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la nyid do //
translated: The letter la is from aṅguli, aṅguli, and so on.🔽The letter ma is from aṅguli, aṅguli, and so on.🔽The letter na is from ne, ne, and so on.🔽The letter ṇi is from ne, ne, and so on.🔽The letter ḍa is from ḍa, ḍa, and so on.

original: aam ku li:/...(sor mo/) aa ti:/...(zhes mgron po/)thi:/...(mngon par lhag pa/) n'i da li dag las mi'o //🔽n'i rab tu thob pa la'o //
analyzed: aam ku li:/...(sor mo/) aa ti:/...(zhes mgron po/)thi:/...(mngon par lhag pa/) n'i da li dag las mi'o // n'i rab tu thob pa la'o //
translated: The letter ṇa is from ṇa, ṇa, and so on.🔽The letter da is from da, da, and so on.

original: na'i na'o // da la rnam par 'joms pa la'o //🔽'di dag las mi pha rol tu 'gyur /
analyzed: na'i na'o // da la rnam par 'joms pa la'o // 'di dag las mi pha rol tu 'gyur /
translated: The letter na is from na, na, and so on.

original: ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas ae nyid do //
analyzed: ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas ae nyid do //
translated: The letter ḍa is from ḍa, ḍa, and so on.🔽The letter ṇa is from ṇa, ṇa, and so on.🔽The letter ta is from ta, ta, and so on.

original: ne mi:/...(shing rta'am mu khyud/)delmi:/...(brgya byin/) a'u rmi:/
analyzed: ne mi:/...(shing rta'am mu khyud/)delmi:/...(brgya byin/) a'u rmi:/
translated: The letter tha is from tha, tha, and so on.🔽The letter da is from da, da, and so on.🔽The letter dha is from dha, dha, and so on.🔽The letter pa is from pa, pa, and so on.🔽The letter pha is from pha, pha, and so on.🔽The letter ba is from ba, ba, and so on.🔽The letter bha is from bha, bha, and so on.🔽The letter ya is from ya, ya, and so on.

original: rasmi / bh'u mi rnams so //🔽ri 'gro la'o //
analyzed: rasmi / bh'u mi rnams so // ri 'gro la'o //
translated: The letter ra is from ra, ra, and so on.🔽The letter la is from la, la, and so on.🔽The letter va is from va, va, and so on.🔽The letter śa is from śa, śa, and so on.

original: ra sa pa mdo'i dbyings so //
analyzed: ra sa pa mdo'i dbyings so //
translated: The letter ṣa is from ṣa, ṣa, and so on.🔽The letter sa is from sa, sa, and so on.🔽The letter ha is from ha, ha, and so on.🔽The letter kṣa is from kṣa, kṣa, and so on.

original: bh'u yod pa la'o //
analyzed: bh'u yod pa la'o //
translated: bhu is for existence.

original: 'di dag las mi pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las mi pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, the other side.

original: de la aarti'i a'u nyid /
analyzed: de la aarti'i a'u nyid /
translated: In this, the au of arthi is itself.

original: ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: Ra is the other side.

original: a'urmi:/..(chu rlabs/)rasmi:/...('od/) tshig phrad las aat /
analyzed: a'urmi:/..(chu rlabs/)rasmi:/...('od/) tshig phrad las aat /
translated: From the particle a, at.

original: aeng du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aeng du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The au does not change.🔽Bhu is for mi.

original: bh'u mi:/..(sa'o//) ku shi las sam ka'o //
analyzed: bh'u mi:/..(sa'o//) ku shi las sam ka'o //
translated: From kushi, sam or ka.

original: ku sha 'gugs pa la'o //
analyzed: ku sha 'gugs pa la'o //
translated: Kushi is for drawing.

original: 'di las si ka pha rol /
analyzed: 'di las si ka pha rol /
translated: From this, sik is the other side.

original: ka yig gi ta la'o zhes pas aata aed dgag pa'i don no /
analyzed: ka yig gi ta la'o zhes pas aata aed dgag pa'i don no /
translated: Since it is said that it is from the ta of the ka syllable, the meaning of the negation of at is ed.

original: sa la sha dha dag gi ka'o zhes pas sa'i ka'o //🔽ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
analyzed: sa la sha dha dag gi ka'o zhes pas sa'i ka'o // ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
translated: Since it is said that the ka of the sa and dha is the ka, the ka of the earth.🔽Since it is also from ku, the sa itself.🔽Kuk is for the belly.

original: kukshi:/...(lto ba/) aa shi las ni ta'o //
analyzed: kukshi:/...(lto ba/) aa shi las ni ta'o //
translated: From ashi, ta.

original: aa sh'u khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: aa sh'u khyab pa la'o //
translated: Ashi is for pervasion.

original: a'u yig ni spri s'ung a'u di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: a'u yig ni spri s'ung a'u di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The au syllable is from sprisung au dita.

original: 'di las sika pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las sika pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, sik is the other side.

original: bra shtsa la sogs pa'i mdo'i sha @116b nyid do //
analyzed: bra shtsa la sogs pa'i mdo'i sha @116b nyid do //
translated: The sa itself is from the sutra of prasha and so on.

original: sa la shadha dag gi kka'o zhes pas ka nyid do //
analyzed: sa la shadha dag gi kka'o zhes pas ka nyid do //
translated: Since it is said that the ka of the sa and dha is the ka, the ka itself.

original: ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do /
analyzed: ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do /
translated: Since it is also from ku, the sa itself.

original: (mig).../ aakshi:/ mri ka ni dag las a'i tsi'o //
analyzed: (mig).../ aakshi:/ mri ka ni dag las a'i tsi'o //
translated: ཨཨཀཤི༔་from ཨཨ་and མྲི་ཀ་.

original: mring srog gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: mring srog gtong ba la'o //
translated: མྲིང་is for giving life.

original: nga yig ngita las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: nga yig ngita las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: ང་is from ངིཏ་.

original: ka na rgyun chags pa'i byings so //
analyzed: ka na rgyun chags pa'i byings so //
translated: ཀ་is for the root of continuity.

original: 'di dag las a'i tsi pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las a'i tsi pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, ཨའི་ཙི་is the other side.

original: ai ka'i aata aenga'o zhes pas aa nyid /
analyzed: ai ka'i aata aenga'o zhes pas aa nyid /
translated: ཨཻ་ཀའི་ཨཨཏ་ཨཨེང,🔽so ཨཨ་itself.

original: rika'i aan la ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid /
analyzed: rika'i aan la ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid /
translated: རིཀའི་ཨཨན་ལ་ར་ལ་དག་གོ་,🔽so ར་is the other side.

original: ma ri tsi:/...(smig rgyu 'am 'od zer/) kan'i tsi:/...('khri shing/) r'a sha di dag las dri sa'o //
analyzed: ma ri tsi:/...(smig rgyu 'am 'od zer/) kan'i tsi:/...('khri shing/) r'a sha di dag las dri sa'o //
translated: མ་རི་ཙི༔་from ཀནའི་ཙི༔་and རའ་ཤ་.

original: r'a l'a len pa la'o //
analyzed: r'a l'a len pa la'o //
translated: རའ་is for taking.

original: shadli rnam par rgyu ba la'o //🔽li yig ni li di ta d+yut sogs /
analyzed: shadli rnam par rgyu ba la'o // li yig ni li di ta d+yut sogs /
translated: ཤདླི་is for moving about.🔽ལི་is from ལི་དི་ཏ་དྱུཏ་,🔽and so on.

original: pu shya ti sogs rnams las aa tang la'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
analyzed: pu shya ti sogs rnams las aa tang la'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //
translated: པུ་ཤྱ་ཏི་and so on.

original: 'di dag las tris pha rol tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di dag las tris pha rol tu 'gyur te /
translated: From these, ཏྲི་is the other side.

original: sa yig ni dbyangs kyi don /
analyzed: sa yig ni dbyangs kyi don /
translated: ས་is for the meaning of vowel.

original: r'a tri:/...(/ mtshan mo/) khar la dzha la'i tsar 'o zhes pas da yig gi ta'o //
analyzed: r'a tri:/...(/ mtshan mo/) khar la dzha la'i tsar 'o zhes pas da yig gi ta'o //
translated: རའ་ཏྲི༔་from ཁར་ལ་ཛྷ་ལའི་ཙར་འོ་,🔽so ད་is ཏའོ།།

original: sha rtri:/...(glang po che/) bh'u s'ung aa di rnams las krina'o //
analyzed: sha rtri:/...(glang po che/) bh'u s'ung aa di rnams las krina'o //
translated: From flesh, elephant, bull, sun, and mountain, [comes] kṛta.

original: bh'u yod pa la'o //
analyzed: bh'u yod pa la'o //
translated: Bhu means to exist.

original: sh'udarb tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'udarb tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Śau means to be born.

original: nga yig sbri s'ud au dita las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: nga yig sbri s'ud au dita las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The sign a has the meaning of to be added.

original: shthi bu shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha'i sa aa da sl'a  bza ba la'o //
analyzed: shthi bu shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha'i sa aa da sl'a  bza ba la'o //
translated: Śathi means not to be cut, and the first śa has the meaning of flesh. Thus, śa means to eat.

original: 'di rnams las krin pha rol tu 'gyur zhing na yig dbyangs don //
analyzed: 'di rnams las krin pha rol tu 'gyur zhing na yig dbyangs don //
translated: From these [comes] kṛta, and the letter na has the meaning of other.

original: ka yig aata aeng dgag pa'i don /
analyzed: ka yig aata aeng dgag pa'i don /
translated: The letter ka has the meaning of at and a has the meaning of negation.

original: bh'u ri:/...(mang po/) s'u ri:/
analyzed: bh'u ri:/...(mang po/) s'u ri:/
translated: Bhu means many, and śuri means sun.

original: ...(nyi ma/) aa dri:/...(ri bo/) sha ka / bh'u dag las aunti /
analyzed: ...(nyi ma/) aa dri:/...(ri bo/) sha ka / bh'u dag las aunti /
translated: Adri means mountain, and śaka means to exist. Thus, unti.

original: aanti tsa dag go //🔽sha kli nus pa la'o ;
analyzed: aanti tsa dag go // sha kli nus pa la'o ;
translated: Anti means to be cut.

original: / bh'u yod pa la'o //
analyzed: / bh'u yod pa la'o //
translated: Śa means to be able, and bhu means to exist.

original: 'di dag las grangs bzhi du aunti /
analyzed: 'di dag las grangs bzhi du aunti /
translated: From these [comes] the number four, unti.

original: aanti tsa dag pha rol du 'gyur ro /🔽tsa dbyangs don /🔽sha kunti:/ ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas ao nyid /
analyzed: aanti tsa dag pha rol du 'gyur ro / tsa dbyangs don / sha kunti:/ ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas ao nyid /
translated: Anti means to be cut, and ca has the meaning of other.🔽 Ca has the meaning of to be added.

original: ae tsa'i aa ya aa ba a'a ya a'a ba /
analyzed: ae tsa'i aa ya aa ba a'a ya a'a ba /
translated: Śa means to be complete, and i has the meaning of at and a has the meaning of negation. Thus, o.🔽 E has the meaning of to be added, and a has the meaning of to be added, and ā has the meaning of to be added.🔽

original: rnams so zhes pas aab ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: rnams so zhes pas aab ru bsgyur ro //
translated: The a is changed to o.

original: bhabanti:/...(dus/) aarti las aarni tsa'o //🔽ri 'gro ba la'o //🔽'di las aarni tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bhabanti:/...(dus/) aarti las aarni tsa'o // ri 'gro ba la'o // 'di las aarni tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The i is changed to u.

original: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don /🔽ai ka'i aata aenga'o zhes pas aa nyid dang / ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don / ai ka'i aata aenga'o zhes pas aa nyid dang / ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: The r is changed to l.🔽The a is changed to o.🔽The u is changed to i.

original: aa ralli:/...(/ glang po che/) aa dzi las aa li tsa'o //
analyzed: aa ralli:/...(/ glang po che/) aa dzi las aa li tsa'o //
translated: The a is changed to o.

original: aanydzu gsal ba la'o //🔽a'u yig ni sbri s'ud a'u di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: aanydzu gsal ba la'o // a'u yig ni sbri s'ud a'u di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don /
translated: The a is changed to u.

original: 'di las aa li tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //🔽tsa yig dbyangs don //🔽na'i yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di las aa li tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro // tsa yig dbyangs don // na'i yang ngo //
translated: The a is changed to o.

original: na'i zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: na'i zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
translated: The i is changed to u.

original: de'i yam du bsgyur bas nya yig go /
analyzed: de'i yam du bsgyur bas nya yig go /
translated: The a is changed to o.🔽The a is changed to u.🔽The a is changed to o.

original: aanydza li:/...(lag pa kha sbyar ba/) ri tr'i sri dhri dha mi aa shi aa bi bri ti /
analyzed: aanydza li:/...(lag pa kha sbyar ba/) ri tr'i sri dhri dha mi aa shi aa bi bri ti /
translated: The a is changed to u.

original: gra ha rnams las aina'o //🔽ri 'gro ba l'a /🔽tr'i @117a * //🔽rgyal ba la'o //
analyzed: gra ha rnams las aina'o // ri 'gro ba l'a / tr'i @117a * // rgyal ba la'o //
translated: The a is changed to o.🔽The a is changed to u.🔽The a is changed to o.

original: sri 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: sri 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The a is changed to u.

original: dhri 'dzin pa la'o //
analyzed: dhri 'dzin pa la'o //
translated: dhrī, to hold.

original: dha ma zhes pa mdo'i byings so //
analyzed: dha ma zhes pa mdo'i byings so //
translated: dharma, the root of sūtra.

original: aa sha za ba la'o //
analyzed: aa sha za ba la'o //
translated: aśa, to eat.

original: aa ba raksha skyong ba la'o //
analyzed: aa ba raksha skyong ba la'o //
translated: avakṣa, to protect.

original: bri tu 'jug pa la'o //
analyzed: bri tu 'jug pa la'o //
translated: bṛtu, to enter.

original: gra ha nye bar len pa la'o //
analyzed: gra ha nye bar len pa la'o //

analyzed: aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //

original: 'di las ni pha rol /
analyzed: 'di las ni pha rol /

analyzed: shri / yu /

original: ba ha / rnams las ni'o //

analyzed: shru thob pa la'o //

analyzed: bha dza / shri bsten pa la'o //

analyzed: yu bsre ba la'o //

original: ba ha thob pa la'o //
analyzed: ba ha thob pa la'o //

analyzed: pri shu bri shu bkru ba la'o //

analyzed: tsu ra rku ba la'o //

analyzed: de la pri shi'i a'a nyid dang ra pha rol nyid do //

analyzed: parshni:/...(rting pa/) bri shi'i aata aeng dgag pa tshig phrad do //

analyzed: bh'urni:/...(sa'i bdag po/) tsu ri'i ring po nyid /

analyzed: tsurni:...(zhib mo/) tu ri'i ring po nyid @117b t'urnni/...(myur ba/) dzi zhes pa 'di'i au nyid dang ra pha rol nyid /

original: bri dri dag las bina'o //
analyzed: bri dri dag las bina'o //

original: brinya sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: brinya sgrib pa la'o //

analyzed: nya yig ni nyi ta la'o zhes pa'i rtags don //

original: dring gus pa la'o //
analyzed: dring gus pa la'o //

analyzed: nga yig ni tang ldan pa las zhes pa'i rtags don to //

analyzed: de dag las bin pha rol tu 'gyur ro // na yig dbyangs don /

original: ai ka'i aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: ai ka'i aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //

original: ra pha rol /
analyzed: ra pha rol /

analyzed: barbi:/...(shing rta'o/) darbi:/ svard'u:/  dz'a gri las kvina'o /

original: dz'a gri gnyid zad pa la'o //
analyzed: dz'a gri gnyid zad pa la'o //

original: aaka phyis pa dang sh'a su ri de ta rnams kyi ma yin no zhes pas ri yig dbyi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aaka phyis pa dang sh'a su ri de ta rnams kyi ma yin no zhes pas ri yig dbyi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The ri of the last two is not elided.

original: d'i dh'i be b'i d'a ri dr'a au rnu dang dz'a garti'i 'ang tshi re dzi aa tsa'i mtha' rnams kyi ni byings rnams kyi rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa'i sbrub pa'o zhes pa'i rigs las so //
analyzed: d'i dh'i be b'i d'a ri dr'a au rnu dang dz'a garti'i 'ang tshi re dzi aa tsa'i mtha' rnams kyi ni byings rnams kyi rjes su 'brel pa ma yin pa'i sbrub pa'o zhes pa'i rigs las so //
translated: The d of dīdhi, the b of bhava, the d of dāridra, the u of uru, and the jā of jāgrati are not connected to the following syllables by the rule “The final of one word is not connected to the initial of the following word.”

original: de las kin pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kin pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: ka yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aing dgag pa'i don ;
analyzed: ka yig ni kita la'o zhes pas aata aing dgag pa'i don ;

analyzed: dz'a gri bi:/...(rgyal po/) tstsha bi la sogs pa rnams so //

analyzed: tsha dang lhag par sgrib pa la'o //

analyzed: shtha 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o //

analyzed: shthi bu shvakka ma yin pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o //

analyzed: rgyu mtshan zhes sogs kyis tha'i tha'o //
translated: tha, the tha of thaṃ, and so on

original: ka ki chags pa la'o //
analyzed: ka ki chags pa la'o //

analyzed: ai yig ni ai di ta kyi numa'o zhes pa'i don /

original: 'dis num au dang ma yig sngar bzhin dbyi /
analyzed: 'dis num au dang ma yig sngar bzhin dbyi /

analyzed: di bu rtse ba la'o //

original: du krinya byed pa la'o //
analyzed: du krinya byed pa la'o //

analyzed: pri shu / bri shu bkru ba'o /

original: dz'i ba srog 'dzin pa la'o //
analyzed: dz'i ba srog 'dzin pa la'o //

analyzed: n'i rab tu thob pa la'o //
translated: nī rab tu thob pa la’o.🔽nī na’o.

analyzed: na'i na'o // 'di rnams las kin pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: rjes su 'brel pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa dbyi'o //

original: ru'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don to //🔽re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o zhes pas thig le nyis brtsegs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ru'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don to // re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o zhes pas thig le nyis brtsegs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The sign of ru is the meaning.🔽Re phā’i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa’o zhes pas thig le nyis brtser ’gyur ro.🔽glo’o.

original: gloo:/...(/ zla ba/) noo:/...(gru/) dzi las na ka'o //
analyzed: gloo:/...(/ zla ba/) noo:/...(gru/) dzi las na ka'o //
translated: no’o.

original: dzi rgyal ba la'o //
analyzed: dzi rgyal ba la'o //

original: 'di las nag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las nag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: dzi na:/...(/ rgyal ba'am sangs rgyas rje btsun/) au na la sogs pa'i 'grel pa las rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: dzi na:/...(/ rgyal ba'am sangs rgyas rje btsun/) au na la sogs pa'i 'grel pa las rkang pa dang po rdzogs so /

original: // / ain bh'i k'a p'asha li ma rtsi rnams pas kana'o //🔽aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: // / ain bh'i k'a p'asha li ma rtsi rnams pas kana'o // aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
translated: 1. The root kan means “to go.”🔽2. The root i means “to go.”

original: bh'i 'jig pa la'o //🔽kee gee ree sgra la'o /
analyzed: bh'i 'jig pa la'o // kee gee ree sgra la'o /
translated: 3. The root bhu means “to go.”🔽4. The root kṛ means “to go.”

original: shita ma yin pa la ae tsa'i aata'o zhes pas a'a nyid do //
analyzed: shita ma yin pa la ae tsa'i aata'o zhes pas a'a nyid do //
translated: 5. The root śi means “to go.”

original: p'a btung ba la'o /
analyzed: p'a btung ba la'o /
translated: 6. The root pā means “to drink.”

original: sha la ha la pa rli lam la 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: sha la ha la pa rli lam la 'gro ba la'o //
translated: 7. The root śal means “to go.”

original: martsa zhes pa mdo'i byings so //🔽'di las kan @118a * //🔽pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: martsa zhes pa mdo'i byings so // 'di las kan @118a * // pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: 8. The root mṛ means “to go.”🔽9. The root par means “to go.”🔽10. The root tar means “to go.”

original: na yig dbyangs kyi don to //
analyzed: na yig dbyangs kyi don to //
translated: 11. The root na means “to go.”🔽12. The root i means “to go.”

original: ai ka'i aata aing zhes pas ae nyid dang / su'i ru nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ai ka'i aata aing zhes pas ae nyid dang / su'i ru nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: 13. The root e means “to go.”🔽14. The root ka means “to go.”🔽15. The root bhe means “to go.”🔽16. The root kṛ means “to go.”🔽17. The root pā means “to go.”

original: ae ka:/...(gcig pu/) bhe ka:/..(sbal ba/) k'a ka:/...(bya rog) p'a ka:/...(/'tshed pa/) shalka:/...(shing shun/) tsu'i ku zhes pas tsa'i ka'o //
analyzed: ae ka:/...(gcig pu/) bhe ka:/..(sbal ba/) k'a ka:/...(bya rog) p'a ka:/...(/'tshed pa/) shalka:/...(shing shun/) tsu'i ku zhes pas tsa'i ka'o //
translated: 18. The root śal means “to go.”🔽19. The root mṛ means “to go.”

original: marka:/...(rlung) yuka la sogs pa rnams so //🔽y'u bsre ba la'o //🔽ri 'gro ba la'o ;
analyzed: marka:/...(rlung) yuka la sogs pa rnams so // y'u bsre ba la'o // ri 'gro ba la'o ;
translated: 20. The root yuj means “to go.”🔽21. The root yu means “to mix.”🔽22. The root ri means “to go.”🔽23. The root pra means “to go.”

original: / pra tha pri thu rgya che ba la'o //
analyzed: / pra tha pri thu rgya che ba la'o //
translated: 24. The root pri means “to go.”

original: aun d'i klas pa la'o //🔽dy'u rnam par g-yo ba la'o //
analyzed: aun d'i klas pa la'o // dy'u rnam par g-yo ba la'o //
translated: [The letter] u is for the realm of the gods.🔽[The letter] ḍha is for movement.

original: sya mu sva na dh'a na sgra la'o //
analyzed: sya mu sva na dh'a na sgra la'o //
translated: [The letter] sy is for sound.

original: aa dza bra dza 'gro ba la'o /
analyzed: aa dza bra dza 'gro ba la'o /
translated: [The letter] ja is for going.

original: bh'i 'jigs pa la'o //
analyzed: bh'i 'jigs pa la'o //
translated: [The letter] bhī is for fear.

original: aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: aina b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
translated: [The letter] iṇ is for going.

original: hr'i ngo tsha ba la'o //
analyzed: hr'i ngo tsha ba la'o //
translated: [The letter] hrī is for shame.

original: ao h'a ka gtong ba la'o /
analyzed: ao h'a ka gtong ba la'o /
translated: [The letter] o is for giving.

original: 'di rnams las kan pha rol tshig phrad mtha'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams las kan pha rol tshig phrad mtha'o //
translated: These are the final particles of the other words.

original: de la yu ti'i ring po nyid /
analyzed: de la yu ti'i ring po nyid /
translated: Among them, the long [vowels] are from yuti, combination,

original: aa tsal sogs pa dang aata las so zhes pas d'a pa'o //
analyzed: aa tsal sogs pa dang aata las so zhes pas d'a pa'o //
translated: and from a, acala, and so on, and from at.

original: d'a yig las a'a yig bzung nas /
analyzed: d'a yig las a'a yig bzung nas /
translated: Having taken the letter a from the letter da,

original: da yig di ta la'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
analyzed: da yig di ta la'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
translated: the letter da is for the meaning of the sign dita.

original: tha'i aa tsa la sogs pa dbyi'o //
analyzed: tha'i aa tsa la sogs pa dbyi'o //
translated: The letter tha is for acala and so on.

original: pa yig dbyangs don /
analyzed: pa yig dbyangs don /
translated: The letter pa is for the meaning of vowel.

original: d'i a'as ring po las so zhes pas su dbyi'o //
analyzed: d'i a'as ring po las so zhes pas su dbyi'o //
translated: The letter di is for the long [vowels] from ā.🔽Otherwise, it is for ru itself and exclusion.

original: gzhan du ru nyid dang rnam par gcad pa'o //

analyzed: ka na sgra la'o //

original: de la ka ni'i aata ai sang gnyis nyid do //
analyzed: de la ka ni'i aata ai sang gnyis nyid do //
translated: There, kanī is two, and ata is now.🔽 Hal is not the first, and da is letter.🔽 Kim is before, and num is coming.🔽 The letter u is the meaning of expression.🔽 The letter ma is the meaning of sign, from mata, having gone beyond, and ac, end.🔽 Ka and nya are letter, like ink.🔽 The nasal sound, and so on, are as before.🔽 dapa,  pair, and kimkinī, (small) bell,🔽 timira,  two, and dvira, double.🔽  Translation: patti,  going on the path.🔽dri,  obscuration.🔽jiśa,  old age.🔽vala,  vow.🔽rīji,  going.🔽brahballa,  chief.🔽śrī,  harm.🔽pari,  yoke.🔽dara,  destroying.🔽pāra,  the realm of the sūtras.🔽sari,  going.🔽mana,  consciousness.🔽kana,  sound.🔽There, kanī is two, and ata is now.

analyzed: au yig brjod don //

analyzed: 'di rnams las aanda tsa pha rol du 'gyur zing shi ta bzhin no //

original: yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas ao nyid /

analyzed: zhes pas d'i sha'o //

analyzed: nga yig d'i la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

analyzed: ng'i la'o zhes pas aa yig dbyi'o //

analyzed: yang dag par grub pa la'o //

analyzed: bh'a sri 'bar ba sman /

analyzed: tsu ra sogs las ni tsa'o //

analyzed: sha ha bzod pa la'o //

original: ma di rgyan la'o //
analyzed: ma di rgyan la'o //

analyzed: sbyor ba po'i bya ba la ni tsa'o // tsa yig dbyangs don /

analyzed: he ma zhes pa do'i byings so //

analyzed: 'di rnams las aanta tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas ao nyid ae tsa'i aa ya ya ba a'a ya a'a ba rnams so //

analyzed: bha banta/...(dus/) snga ma bzhin du ae nyid dang aa ba ru bsgyur ba'ang ngo //

analyzed: a'a lu aa y'a ai rnu rnams la aa ya'o zhes pas gandi mandi dag gi ni aa ya ru bsgyur ro //

original: bh'u las du ta tsa'o //
analyzed: bh'u las du ta tsa'o //
translated: 6. bhūlaḥ, 7. dutaś ca.

original: bh'u yod pa la'o //
analyzed: bh'u yod pa la'o //

original: aa ta sngon du /
analyzed: aa ta sngon du /

original: du ta tsa pha rol /
analyzed: du ta tsa pha rol /
translated: Du means “other.”

original: tsa yig dbyangs don //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs don //
translated: The syllable ca has the meaning of a vowel.

original: du yig las au yig bzung ste /
analyzed: du yig las au yig bzung ste /

original: da yig ni dita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /
analyzed: da yig ni dita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don /

original: mtha'i aa tsa /🔽la sogs pas au yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: mtha'i aa tsa / la sogs pas au yig dbyi'o //

original: su'o // su aa ma dag gi ma ning las so zhes pas rjes su 'jug bzhin pa las aa ta las aa ma'o zhes pas aam gyi dngos po'o //
analyzed: su'o // su aa ma dag gi ma ning las so zhes pas rjes su 'jug bzhin pa las aa ta las aa ma'o zhes pas aam gyi dngos po'o //

original: aam la sngon ma'o zhes pas pha rol sngon ma nyid do //
analyzed: aam la sngon ma'o zhes pas pha rol sngon ma nyid do //
translated: “The former other” means that the former other is itself.

original: aadbh'u tam/...(ngo mtshar ba/) ru hi /
analyzed: aadbh'u tam/...(ngo mtshar ba/) ru hi /
translated: 1. adbhūtaḥ, 2. ruhiḥ,

original: hri / shya rnams las aita tsa'o //
analyzed: hri / shya rnams las aita tsa'o //

original: ru ha skye bar rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: ru ha skye bar rab tu skye ba la'o //

original: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //
analyzed: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //

original: g'ang shyeeng 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: g'ang shyeeng 'gro ba la'o //

original: nga yig ngir las so zhes pa'i rtags kyi don /
analyzed: nga yig ngir las so zhes pa'i rtags kyi don /

analyzed: shita ma yin pa la ae tsa'i a'ata'o//

original: 'di rnams las aita tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las aita tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: tsa yig dbyangs don /
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs don /

original: yang ba mtha' nye'o zhes pas ao nyid /
analyzed: yang ba mtha' nye'o zhes pas ao nyid /

analyzed: ro hi ta:/...(nya/) ka pi rika la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas la nyid do //

analyzed: lo hi ta:/...(khrag/) ai ka'i aata aeng zhes pas aa nyid /

original: ra pha rol /
analyzed: ra pha rol /

original: ha ri ta:/...(ljang gu/) la nyid kyis /
analyzed: ha ri ta:/...(ljang gu/) la nyid kyis /

analyzed: @123b la hi ta:/...(ljang gu/) gnyis dag gi gcig aata aeng zhes pas ae nyid do //

analyzed: shyeeta:/...(/ dkar po/) bhrinya la sogs pa rnams las aata tsa'o //

analyzed: du bhrinya 'dzin pa la'o //

original: dri shir lta ba la'o //
analyzed: dri shir lta ba la'o //

original: dzi rgyal ba la'o //
analyzed: dzi rgyal ba la'o //

original: aarba parba 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: aarba parba 'gro ba la'o //

original: ya dza lha mchod pa la'o //
